Treasury Design System

Visual Style

The U.S. Treasury Visual Style includes colors, typography, and layout/grid structure that is to be used across websites and applications.

  • Color
  • Typography
  • Size and Spacing Units
  • Grid, Layout, and Responsive Web Design
  • CSS Utilities
  • Icons
